text: Miconia guayaquilensis is a species of plant in the family Melastomataceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador guayaquilensis Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxa named by Aimé Bonpland Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Miconia guayaquilensis
